title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 259.6 - Internal shutoff valves
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 259.6 - Internal shutoff valves

State Regulations

Notwithstanding section
259.1
of this Part, any LNG tank
temporarily taken out of service and purged to atmosphere shall be fitted with
an internal shutoff valve meeting the requirements of NFPA 59A section 6-3.3.3
(as described in section
10.3
of this Title) prior to being
put back into service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
259.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
